channel.title: Adding ::Yell?
channel.description:
Im coding a server :D
And i need ::yell Help?

item.title: Adding ::Yell?
item.dc:creator: @shadytheone shadytheone
item.description:
@shadytheone wrote:

Here’s a yell command.

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
						command.substring(5).trim();
			if (muted == 1) {
			sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
			return;
			}
			if (playerRights == 0) {
			PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " Shouts: " + command.substring(5);
			} 
			if (playerRights == 1) {
			PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[MOD]-" + playerName + " Shouts: " + command.substring(5);
			} 
			if (playerRights == 2) {
			PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[ADMIN]-" + playerName + " Shouts: " + command.substring(5);
			} 
			if (playerRights == 3) {
			PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[CO-OWNER]-" + playerName + " Shouts: " + command.substring(5);
			} 
			if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Shady")) {
			PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "[OWNER]-" + playerName + " Shouts: " + command.substring(5);
			}
		}

Read full topic
